revised_title: Fertilisation and Cytological Features in Pinus silvestris
tldr: This paper provides a detailed account of the cytological aspects of fertilisation in Pinus silvestris, including the formation of the ventral canal cell, the role of metaplasmic substance in nucleus enlargement, and the behavior of nuclei in the egg. The study also examines the number of chromosomes in the egg nucleus and various types of sporophytic tissue.
